org.apache.juneau.jena

Class RdfSerializerContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.Context
      • org.apache.juneau.BeanContext
        • org.apache.juneau.serializer.SerializerContext
          • org.apache.juneau.jena.RdfSerializerContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RdfCommonContext

    public final class RdfSerializerContext
extends SerializerContext
implements RdfCommonContext
    Configurable properties on the RdfSerializer class.

    Context properties are set by calling PropertyStore.setProperty(String, Object) on the property store passed into the constructor.

    See PropertyStore for more information about context properties.

    Configurable properties inherited by the RDF serializers
    • BeanContext - Properties associated with handling beans on serializers and parsers.
      • SerializerContext - Configurable properties common to all serializers.
        • RdfCommonContext - Configurable properties common to the RDF serializers and parsers.

    • Field Detail

      • RDF_addLiteralTypes

        public static final String RDF_addLiteralTypes
        Configuration property: Add XSI data types to non-String literals.

        • Name: "RdfSerializer.addLiteralTypes"
        • Data type: Boolean
        • Default: false
        • Session-overridable: true
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • RDF_addRootProperty

        public static final String RDF_addRootProperty
        Configuration property: Add RDF root identifier property to root node.

        • Name: "RdfSerializer.addRootProperty"
        • Data type: Boolean
        • Default: false
        • Session-overridable: true

        When enabled an RDF property http://www.apache.org/juneau/root is added with a value of "true" to identify the root node in the graph. This helps locate the root node during parsing.

        If disabled, the parser has to search through the model to find any resources without incoming predicates to identify root notes, which can introduce a considerable performance degradation.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • RDF_autoDetectNamespaces

        public static final String RDF_autoDetectNamespaces
        Configuration property: Auto-detect namespace usage.

        • Name: "RdfSerializer.autoDetectNamespaces"
        • Data type: Boolean
        • Default: true
        • Session-overridable: true

        Detect namespace usage before serialization.

        If enabled, then the data structure will first be crawled looking for namespaces that will be encountered before the root element is serialized.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • RDF_namespaces

        public static final String RDF_namespaces
        Configuration property: Default namespaces.

        • Name: "RdfSerializer.namespaces.list"
        • Data type: List<Namespace>
        • Default: empty list
        • Session-overridable: true

        The default list of namespaces associated with this serializer.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • RDF_addBeanTypeProperties

        public static final String RDF_addBeanTypeProperties
        Configuration property: Add "_type" properties when needed.

        • Name: "RdfSerializer.addBeanTypeProperties"
        • Data type: Boolean
        • Default: false
        • Session-overridable: true

        If true, then "_type" properties will be added to beans if their type cannot be inferred through reflection. This is used to recreate the correct objects during parsing if the object types cannot be inferred. For example, when serializing a Map<String,Object> field, where the bean class cannot be determined from the value type.

        When present, this value overrides the SerializerContext.SERIALIZER_addBeanTypeProperties setting and is provided to customize the behavior of specific serializers in a SerializerGroup.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
